name: ZFERA
description:
my very first video game : )

I been working on a much bigger 3rd person video game + a VR experience / game

however I wanted to scale down and make something short and fun in the mean time to introduce these worlds

( i made this in couple weeks while in a cast with a  broken dominant arm lol )

hope you enjoy please give me feedback !!

New update coming 02.01.20
